newsitem.title: USA: ValueVision unit buys direct marketers.
newsitem.headline: ValueVision unit buys direct marketers.

text.p: ValueVision International Inc said Monday one of its subsidiaries acquired two direct marketing companies with annual revenues of about $30 million.

The two Boston-based sister companies, Catalog Ventures Inc and Mitchell & Webb Inc, publish five consumer specialty catalogs, including Nature's Jewelry, Pyramid Collection, Serengeti, NorthStyle and The Mind's Eye. The purchase price was about $7.1 million, said ValueVision Direct Marketing Co.
ValueVision International is a television home shopping concern based in Eden Prairie, Minn.
